title: Simulation-Based Industry-Linked Employment Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Simulation-based learning using real-time video conferencing tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, integrating practical skills and theoretical knowledge through graduate-level social sciences curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can complete simulation tasks resembling real corporate environments with at least 80% completion
Learners can apply collaboration and communication skills in team-based problem-solving to produce practical reports
Learners can improve self-presentation and job competency understanding by at least 10% through mock interview simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
